0.3.0 (unreleased):

  - using subprocess module of Python

  - new Convert() class for high-level XSLFO access

  - logger added

  - better checks for XINC, XFC

  - updated documentation


0.2.0 (16.06.2007):

  - PDF support added

  - command line interface added

  - mxTidy integration


0.1.0 (16.06.2007):

  - initial release
